title: FS: T206 Wild Bill Donovan (throwing) SGC 5/60...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Wild Bill Donovan (throwing) SGC 5/60...
posts.post_content:
Greetings gents. I have a SGC 5/60 T206 Wild Bill Donovan (throwing) for sale. Price is $100 firm.  Sorry for the hazy scans, the card is not.

I am more than willing to trade this card should you have any T207, T210, or Rube Waddell cards I am looking for.
